title: Ao shin Speculation
body:
Ok so if everyone has noticed on bot side near tri bush there is a cave/hole could this be a hint by riot that Ao Shin is going to be released soon?
The reason why I believe this is that we got shown the symbol for bard before his annocement also this paragraph on lol wiki it does seem to fit with bards lore about saving runeterra.
Legend holds that when Ionia faces its greatest crisis, Ao Shin will descend from the sky.
Also the object that bard destroys is Ionian.

replies.body: I'm still waiting for Urf the Manatee to be officially released! Urfwick is not enough for me!

> [{quoted}](name=Fog,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=L8irB9uE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-18T21:58:48.032+0000)
>
> I'm still waiting for Urf the Manatee to be officially released! Urfwick is not enough for me!

R.I.P Urf stupid Warwick
This is the only thing they have shown so far but this was a while ago so i think it might change.
I HOPE SO. WHEN WAS THE LAST 'GOOD' MID LANER RELEASED. Are there any leaks of his abilities or anything? Or what KIND of mid laner he'll be?
He's obviously going to be a jungler.
